definition: to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote
to walk (side part of split character)
to demolish a building and relocate the inhabitants
Suqian prefecture level city in Jiangsu
to yield/to adapt to/to accommodate to (sth)
Sima Qian (145-86 BC), Han Dynasty historian, author of Records of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], known as the father of Chinese historiography
things change with the passage of time (idiom)
to move (from one residence to another)
Suqian prefecture level city in Jiangsu

sentences.english: The land has been confiscated and all the formalities are ready for starting construction.
sentences.chinese: 该项目土地已征迁，各项手续齐备，可开工建设。

sentences.english: My ancestors came from Switzerland in 1742…
sentences.chinese: 我的祖先在1742年从瑞士迁来。

sentences.english: Rights of Peasants account can also be non-GM farmers to move back home it?
sentences.chinese: 户口农转非啦还可以迁回家非转农吗？

sentences.english: Our office has been moved from Beijing to Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 我们的办公室已从北京迁到上海。

sentences.english: The demolishment of the Star Ferry Pier in 2006 intensified such movements.
sentences.chinese: 2006年，天星码头的迁拆更强化了这类行动。

sentences.english: We will relocate the factory outside the city.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把工厂迁到城外。

sentences.english: There are plans to move the capital to Willow, near Anchorage. Population, 551,947.
sentences.chinese: 现计划迁州府到安克雷奇附近的威洛。

sentences.english: And the LORD have removed men far away, and there be a great forsaking in the midst of the land.
sentences.chinese: 并且耶和华将人迁到远方，在这境内撇下的地土很多。

sentences.english: The monument was moved bodily to a new site.
sentences.chinese: 纪念碑整个迁到一个新场址。

sentences.english: He wants to move to the country.
Some suggestions on in-situ and ex-situ conservations are brought up in the article.
sentences.chinese: 对坡鹿的就地保护和迁地保护提出了一些建议。

sentences.english: Japan should move a number of people there from the radiant areas?
sentences.chinese: 日本应该从受核辐射的地区迁大量的人过去居住。

sentences.english: His family moved around when he was growing up.
sentences.chinese: 他从小到大一家人便老是迁来迁去。

sentences.english: Therefore I will send you into exile' beyond Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我要把你们迁到巴比伦外去。

sentences.english: And after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel;
sentences.chinese: 迁到巴比伦之后，耶哥尼雅生撒拉铁。

sentences.english: How could these ancient pianos have survived the vicissitudes of life?
sentences.chinese: 世事多变迁，这些钢琴是如何幸存至今的呢？
